analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x7b7b239e7fc2b4680f5cf469ecb968bd94bb38aa.sol:
	Contract CoSoundToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x7b7b239e7fc2b4680f5cf469ecb968bd94bb38aa.sol#284-285)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
